title: Jack Dorsey, who resigned as Twitter CEO last year and left its board this year, apologizes and ‘takes responsibility’ for Elon Musk’s mass layoffs
dc:creator: Steve Mollman
description: Dorsey and Musk are longtime friends and associates and texted about plans to work together on Twitter earlier this year.
content:encoded: Dorsey and Musk are longtime friends and associates and texted about plans to work together on Twitter earlier this year. Read More
